Package irobots.vision

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Camera
    Abstracts the access to the NXTCam and provides utility functions to read the objects detected by the camera.
    ColorSensor
    Abstracts the access to the NXT color sensor and provides utility functions to read information about detected chips or border lines.
    CompassSensor
    This class provides access to the compass sensor which is calibrated in a way that 0Â° are on the positive x-axis.
    DetectedObject
    This class contains information about an object which has been detected by the robots camera sensor such as distance and angle to the other object as well as the colormap id of the detected object.
